mapper.insert: INSERT INTO thought (createTime, content, uid) VALUES (#{createTime},#{content},#{uid})
mapper.select: SELECT thought.id, thought.createTime, thought.content, thought.uid, user.name FROM thought left join user on thought.uid = user.id
SELECT thought.id, thought.createTime, thought.content, thought.uid, user.name FROM thought left join user on thought.uid = user.id where thought.uid=#{uid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM thought where id=#{id} and uid=#{uid}
